column5: With the weather warming my son and i have headed out to try a few tribs northward and have been rewarded with some energized and hungry steel. these fish jumped and faught like fall fish, a few pics from past couple of weeks. thats it for us with the steel as the rivers we go to are pretty much empty now of steel.        Berge
nice they are still hiding out in lots of places if you know where to look  just takes alot of walking to find them!
